description:
**Job Description**
**In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:**
 Project Engineering:
   

  

* Execute Hardware \\& Software Controls engineering.
* Technical evaluation of bid for specifications.
* Develop/review Bill of materials, network architecture, GA drawings
* Technically support vendor selection.
* Implement the Ovation control logic and graphics for the Gas Turbine control system.
* Test, verify and document using Gas Turbine Simulator that the Ovation control system performs to specification.
* Develop the narrative control document describing the gas turbine unit operation and its associated alarms and trips.
* Conduct the Hardware \\& Software Design Review (SDR) and Factory Acceptance Test (FAT) with the customer.
* Provide Installation and Commissioning Support to field service team.
* Provide post\\-Installation Customer Service Support.
* Participate in project internal and customer Kick of Meeting (KOM)
* Co\\-ordinate with US lead engineer for design/implementation of control and graphics
* Track project budget, progress \\& quality of the projects and ensure periodic reporting to front offices.


 Field Services:
   

  

* Preparing site execution plans with help of project manager
* Leading the site team for Ovation system power up, redundancy and I/O testing
* Maintaining protocols for loop check, device check and panel charging
* Leading the site team for Analog and Binary Device testing and fault finding
* Engaging with customer and vendors on technical aspects of site commissioning and report the progress and flags the roadblocks and challenges to site manager or project manager.
* Fault diagnosis of Ovation system, network system, and various communication interfaces like OPC, Modbus, DNP3, serial etc.
* Loop and device checking and necessary modifications in the logics, graphics, and database as per customer /site requirements
* Working closely with engineering team for troubleshooting of HW/SW (e.g. controllers, modules, link modules etc.)

* Experience with ISA and SAMA logic symbols, Process \\& Instrumentation Diagrams.

* Gas Turbine process knowledge.

* Ability to effectively present information and respond to questions from groups of managers, clients and customers.
* Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written.
* Ability and willingness to travel as may be required

* Experience with electrical, mechanical, and hydraulic schematics.
* Ability to write reports, business correspondence, and technical documents.
